main_definition: The eyes are the organs of vision in humans, which provide visual perception by detecting light and converting it into electro-chemical impulses that can be interpreted by the brain.

meanings_and_examples.example: She has a keen eye for detail.
His eyes lit up when he saw the solution to the problem.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expression of emotion, particularly surprise or shock
meanings_and_examples.example: Her eyes widened in disbelief at the unexpected news.
The wise old man spoke with great insight from his many years of experience.
He kept a keen eye on the clock as he waited for his appointment to begin.
